targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, query) (rate(coderd_db_query_latencies_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, path) (rate(coderd_api_request_latencies_seconds_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", path=~"^/api/v2/.*"}[$__rate_interval])))
sum by(method, path) (rate(coderd_api_request_latencies_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", path=~"^/api/v2/.*"}[$__rate_interval]))
